data.text: Irritating! First, let's just say the game itself is not bad. The graphics are ok. The questions are not extremely hard. It would be enjoyable but it is so very irritating to watch an ad after every single question! The ads are longer than the actual game time, totally ridiculous. And then the ad freezes and you have to restart the game. I'm not sure why this got so high of a review. I understand ads are necessary but not like this. I will be deleting this game.

If you like continuous ads this is the game for you. I accept and understand needing ads to make games free. This goes way beyond. If the long, endless ads don't ruin it for you the tiny X to close the ads usually just sending you to play store will. Game would be fun if not for the insane amount of ads. In between each question on the quiz show, long ad. Every single question.

Needs an option to turn off tutorials also no option to NOT use the 'friend suggested answer's. Questions are really too simple. Hey I live under a rock in the woods and I still got all the answers correct. Personally tho I'm not a real fan of trivia games tho this one is of the better ones I've played. English is not 'broken'. Questions are clear for comprehension. Only gave it a 4* because if I want help I'd ask for it. Dislike it being forced on my gameplay. Also ads don't always load.

Decided to come back and update my comments. I actually enjoy this game. Sometimes I get wrong answers when I'm not paying close enough attention re: names üôÉ....it is amazing the things I have actually learned while playing this game. One thing for sure I wish they would get rid of Harry Potter, Friends and a few other shows. I never ever watched any of these two shows but I lose quite frequently when I'm asked questions about these 2 shows which seems to come up quite a bit. Bleh üòµ.
data.replyText: Hello! We're glad to hear that you're having fun in our trivia game! Thanks for playing!

data.text: Fun game. It has issues though. Ads play at full volume unless each is muted separately. Makes it hard to play in, say, a doctor's office. Ads also crash the game at an alarming rate. Scree just goes black & locks up. When you restart you lose your previous progress. I'm ok with it because I'm just playing for the questions. If you really want to advance in the game this will frustrate you no end.

I really wanted to like this. Two bad things within the first 5 minutes. 1 - I turned the sound and music off in settings as I like yo play at work, but when the first add came on it blew out the speaker so everyone could hear. 2 - with that loud ad it also stuck me in some weird loop switching between the ad and the app store. Sorry folks but this is a loser.

I enjoy trivia and this would've been a nice app if not for the constant ads. Every 3 questions then an ad that takes longer than the question round itself. The ads have no mute so it's sudden blaring sounds. I don't want to turn down my phone's volume, and the game settings only apply to the game not the ads. Uninstalling because of the annoying ads not the game itself.

I enjoy it. I play it on Alpha to work towards gift cards. The problem I have is that to change topics or try again requires 100 coins. Not a lot for certain. However, if you run short it's either buy more or watch adverts for 15 coins per advert. That's of course 7 adverts to make enough for 1 attempt. Additionally I can only get the adverts to play less than half the tries I make. I'm not one to spend money to make money. Also there is a limit to how many adverts you can watch in a given time

neat little game of trivia,but you,d better be on ur toes because it will throw some questions to you that will test your knowledge of the categories that you choose of course if you really need help it does have a hint button, we hich even I have had to employ a couple of times and it has a nice variety of categories to choose from or to change to..it's addictive to me I love it..it starts easy but gets deeper and deeper so have fun you brained out there

I have really enjoyed this game and sometimes having to think back in order to remember the answers. It can be played from easy to hard depending on the category you choose. If you choose one you are not familiar with you can learn something new, or choose a category you really know to build up money and gems. The choice is totally up to you!

fun & addicting. However, I've learned a lot. Can't wait to play everyday. Really look forward to Free Fridays, helps me get back what I lost all week. I play daily, a good way for me to relax, well, unless I get too many wrongü§£ Certainly, it would be a great game to teach kids to spell. Wayyyyy too addicting, but soooooo much funüòÅ A great evening game, helps to relax. I look forward to it every day. I encourage all to download it and put their trivia skills to the test. I'm always learning
data.replyText: Hi! We‚Äôre glad you liked our trivia game. We appreciate the feedback!

data.text: Trivia Star is a great game to help strengthen your mind and teach you knew information. That I give 5*****, but it can use some work in the technical side of the game. If they could only figure out why it crashes after every two (2) levels it would a very enjoyable game. And because of this problem I give the game/app an overall score of 3***

This game was decent... until it wasn't. My level progress, quiz show, experts are all wrong and have stopped updating and reflecting accuracy. There is no way for me to share past progress because it's been reset. Example, my art category level just said level 1 when I was previously way beyond (3 or 4). It takes time and coins to build levels and experts. It's like this on all the categories and features of the game. It's been 3 days now, no response. Pointless to play now.
data.replyText: Hi there. Our support team would like to assist with any trouble you‚Äôre having with getting the game to run. Please send them an in-app message or email at support@superfree.com

data.text: I like this game in general and I love trivia, but this game has some major issues. First off this game has a ton of ads, I know free games are gonna have ads that's fine but because of the second problem the trouble with the ads is exasperated. Second, glitches and bugs, this game is absolutely loaded with them, and the worst part is a lot of times it ends up costing you coins or gems in the game through no fault of your own. Annoying! I will say though, tech will help you if you write to them.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: I really enjoyed this game and didn't even mind the ads and having to pay 100 coins for each set of questions. There were a dozen categories to choose from for standard play, with leagues and quiz show, etc. Then they "new and improved" it where you get 3 (rotating) categories, or you can use your gems for 2 others. This cut options down to nothing unless you pay, pay, pay. No thanks. Uninstalling.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: I like the game the questions are challenging and its fun to play. However, I have uninstalled it because after each level an ad pops up which isnt a big deal except they glitch so you have to close the game and reopen, which means you lose your turn and your money all because the ad glitched. Very frustrating! What's wven more frustrating is the developer's response to this issue.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: I just installed this game and I am about to get rid of it. Every level costs you 100 coins which is almost what you make after beating said level, then they force you to watch an ad for EVERY level you advance. It makes it for a not fun experience. I understand the need for ads but there is that and then there is this nightmare. If you want free ads, it will cost you $3.99 A WEEK!! I thought this would be a good one.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: Love it. Ads can be avoided by going to ‚úà mode. What is maddening is the "Experts". It already costs 20 üíé which you basically have to purchase, then in order to get a clear answer, you have to spend coins which you also have to purchase, unless you are a genius or walking Wikipedia, to "Upgrade " your expert. Need to quit being greedy and either make rewards more or cut out all the little chipping away at our finances.
data.replyText: Hi! We‚Äôre so glad you‚Äôre having fun with our trivia game. Happy gaming!

data.text: I tried this game. I played it for about 30 minutes. It's a cute trivia game. Unfortunately, after you complete a level, you have to pay 100 coins to play the next level. I also tried playing in airplane ‚úàÔ∏è mode in order to avoid the ads. That didn't work for me. You have to watch an ad after each level too along s with paying the 100 coins. No fun!
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: I like trivia, so I decided download this game. Seriously, there are more ads than game time comparatively. Continual ads. I deleted the app after like 5 minutes. Added for dev reply: The amount of ads would more than account for operating costs, both technical and physical. I've played similar games with different themes that only show two, 15 second ads at the beginning and every 5 minutes after. This is overkill.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: It's the pop-up ads! I have 3-6 games, 3 of which I play every single day, several times a day and I willingly watch their ads. Why? Because I'm rewarded for watching them with diamonds or coins or play money, something that I can really use to advance. Sometimes I just open them and play the ads so I have bonuses when I decide to play. But ads popping up that can't be closed until 30-45 seconds? Ads that I can't control? No, I'm deleting the game. So this game is being uninstalled. Sorry!
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: The ads are out of control. Seriously. I tried the game for less than 5 minutes. I had to uninstall. The amount of ads (15 seconds of trivia for 25+ seconds of ads) is just way too much. I didn't even get to play long enough to see if I would WANT to purchase no ads. As it stands now, I would absolutely NOT pay money for this. Very bare bones trivia highlighted by greedy ad behavior.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: Great game ruined by greed and ads. The content of the game is terrific. This could be a go-to game for many of us to pass the time. The difficulty progression is excellent. The questions are plentiful. So much that I've yet to see a repeated one. Unfortunately, you're greeted with an irritating advertisement after each level, which makes it nearly unplayable. The cost to remove ads is their "VIP" package at $3.99 per week.. WEEK! I would gladly pay a few bucks to just remove ads, ONCE.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: Love trivia, dislike crashes! The game crashes with me after every ad which is after every play. For some reason, after the commercial plays, there is no X to click to exit the commercial and/or the commercial doesn't just end and take you back to your game. It just sits there staring at you until you have to shut down the game as it's not responding. To go back into the game and play again, it costs you more coins. Then crashes on the very next commercial. Very annoying! Delete!!!
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: I've contacted the developer because it takes my coins to play, then freezes up. Not once but 8x today. I originally contacted them about 4, but it just kept happening. It's an ok game, makes things fun. But, I don't like being robbed of stuff. Seemingly no issues with constant ads. A lot of ads. Waiting for reply. If no resolution? Definitely uninstalling. I've paid for certain things, but not worth it imo.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: It's fun to play but has so many glitches it's silly. üòÇ The difficulty of the questions are all over the place too. Questions as easy as what does red + blue make, and then random stuff that most people wouldn't know, and the difficulty isn't based on level either, it's completely random. It's fun tho, a good mindless game. And the ads have gotten way better lately. I'm so sick of seeing the Project Makeover ad.
data.replyText: Hello! We would like to improve your experience, if there‚Äôs anything the support team can do to assist, just send them a message through the game.

data.text: Too many ads!!! You have to use coins to move to the next level, then watch an ad too. Ads everywhere, and repeating pop ups to get you to spend more money. If I'm using coins to move up, dont make me watch an ad. And for every level. The ads last longer than it takes to answer the questions during the level. Makes an otherwise decent game absolutely unappealing
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: I pay the $2.99 to not have ads, but the ads STILL KEEP COMING! Very disappointing. I thought this was a cool game until I got so irritated about the ads, I ended paying the $2.99! But to no avail, they kept coming! Can I get a refund/my money back or something?? This isn't cool at all. And just to let everyone else know that, after every 3 questions, it's an ad. Also, if you hit the (X) button on the top of the window to end the game on accident, it's an ad as well! So not the deal!!!!
data.replyText: It's understandable that ads can get annoying. Unfortunately, we need the revenue from ads to keep our games free to play. You can purchase to remove ads for just a couple of dollars. If you have any questions or comments, you can send us a message from the 'Contact Us' feature in your game menu.

data.text: The commercials are way to exasperating. Even when the X in the corner shows, it might take 5 to as many as 7 times to get back to the game. If I want to download the game that's 8n the commercial I would've done it already. The commercial are distracting and there are way to many. Fix it to a commercial every 3 times of play and I'll play again. But for now... Uninstalling.
data.replyText: Hello! We would like to improve your experience, if there‚Äôs anything the support team can do to assist, just send them a message through the game.

data.text: Ads prevent you from playing. Only Ford Truck ads appeared for me and a close button is visible, but it doesn't work. You can even visit the site, and it still won't let you close the ad. What's even worse is it shows up After you have paid 100 gems to play a game. Makes the game completely useless. Otherwise. This game has tons of potential and actually could be a good game, but ads suck. Not wasting any more time on it. Uninstalling.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: This has a lot of potential to be a fun casual trivia game. There are random events that make the game interesting as well as 48hr tournaments to try to compete with others. However, the ranking system is very broken. After climbing up for a while, I'm suddenly knocked down every time despite finishing in the top of my group each time. Instead of climbing up two levels I was knocked down instead, for no obvious reason. They said they were having issues, but this makes the game not worth playing.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your review. We‚Äôre sorry to hear you haven‚Äôt been enjoying the game, is there something in particular you‚Äôd like to see? Let the support team know by sending an in-app message.

data.text: It WAS fun. The new ads are frustrating. Lately...the ads are zoomed in and appear too big to close as the (X) is now off screen. You can't scroll and only remedy is force close. But that means you lose the amount of coins that you already commited to play the next quiz BEFORE the ad shows up. It's a ripoff. *EDIT* I don't mind the ads. But they need to be in the PROPER format. When ad is over let me close or even tap thru to install, but neither happens.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: There's an add before every round. However, it gives you the option to skip to almost the END of every one. So honestly it's not that bad. Your ready to play more so it's worth the 5-8 sec Oppose to 30!! It's fun to play. Keeps you busy. Passes time. I gotta say I'm really lovin the short ads! The option to skip or watch if you choose on every ad, love it! Honestly if it didn't offer this (with as many ads as it plays) I would have uninstalled it in the first 3 mins. All apps should do this!!
data.replyText: Hi! We‚Äôre so glad you‚Äôre having fun with our trivia game. Happy gaming!

data.text: I think this is a good concept. But for me, the questions are too easy. I recommend making them a bit harder so it will be more entertaining, but not so extreme that it is impossible to complete. Also, I think you should raise the amount of coins you get from watching an ad. Nobody wants to watch an ad to get a measly 15 coins! Love the multipliers when you finish the level though, amazing feature! I think you should play this game if you like easier trivias.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: The first time I played I found zero issues as long as I kept winning. However, I did notice that my coin level did hover around the same amount regardless of the fact that I did in fact keep winning. In app coins, as well as in app stars are needed to purchase levels. I can only surmise that once I begin losing this will change very quickly. Other than this observation and from my limited experience playing I have to say that it is a great app with good animation, ideas and sound. Try it out.
data.replyText: We are glad you‚Äôre enjoying our free trivia game! If there‚Äôs anything you‚Äôd like to see included in a future update, send our Support Team an in-app message any time.

data.text: The game is fine, but the freezes make it extremely frustrating. Sometimes after you answer the final question, the game won't advance. All you can do is force close the game. You lose your coins and don't get any rewards. It happens really frequently too so you're constantly being cheated out of coins/progress/rewards. If this gets fixed, I'd be willing to amend my rating.
data.replyText: Hello! We would like to improve your experience, if there‚Äôs anything the support team can do to assist, just send them a message through the game.

data.text: I really like trivia but really dislike ads. I get it. Ads sustain games especially when free to play but there are way to much it makes it not enjoyable at all. But hey I really like trivia so I decided to support the devs and pay for no more ads. Now I can actually enjoy the game and make it to the end and earn a reward, but no. I still have not earned any reward at all after 10 questions because after the 10th correct answer the game freezes. Every single time. And of course no refunds.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: This game is fun. It starts out easy and gradually gets tougher. I like the way it gives you options for getting more stuff by watching videos or buying. If you don't like the ads then it's only 3 bucks. I like to challenge myself by not buying anything or watching extra videos for stuff. Not very many ads and I know I didn't buy my answers! I streaked to 79! Lots of fun!
data.replyText: We are glad you‚Äôre enjoying our free trivia game! If there‚Äôs anything you‚Äôd like to see included in a future update, send our Support Team an in-app message any time.

data.text: Far too many ads,l you play a couple of rounds and an ad pops up. I play many free games that don't push nearly as many ads. Although the game is fun, it's annoying with the ad breaks. Reply to developer post: I understand ads help with keeping the game "free", but consider looking at other small business games and compare their running ads to this one. As I said, I play many other free games and apparently they're doing well with minimal ads.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: Crash, crash, crash ... everytime they pop in an ad, the game freezes and must be restarted. That's not fun. I hadn't been playing for even 15 minutes when an ad popped in, the game froze, and I had to do a hard restart of my Samsun tablet. These games seem to all be built on the same boilerplate code, and that boilerplate routine that allows ads to pop in has a glitch, because this has happened with other games with pop up ads.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: There are A LOT of ads. I know there have to be ads to pay for the game, but the ads are problematic. They never close correctly, they constantly glitch so that you have to close out of everything and restart in order to play. I see what the developers have done. They put in the horrible ads that don't properly close and then "Pay $6.99 for no ads" to make everyone want to pay for no ads. I don't know how anyone would rate this game as a five star experience. Must be a lot of fake reviews
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: WAY TOO MANY ADS! And yes, I know ads are necessary, which is what the devs reply with(see their reply) to any review mentioning ads, but playing for 30 seconds just to sit through an ad is way too much. A lot of the times you CAN'T SKIP the ads, so overall, unless you pay, you're spending more time watching ads then actually playing the game since each round only lasts maybe 30 seconds. Make it to where there's an ad every 3 levels, at the most. Uninstalling.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: Ridiculous that everything costs coins, and you still have to watch videos. Final straw for me was the challenge where you earned so many coins to get an item... only to find it wasn't free, just discounted from it's normal $9.99 price. Takes the fun right out. Answer to developer; no, there's nothing I want to see in your game, I uninstalled it.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your review. We‚Äôre sorry to hear you haven‚Äôt been enjoying the game, is there something in particular you‚Äôd like to see? Let the support team know by sending an in-app message.

data.text: So far after a couple days of casual play I'm up to level 68 and it's still alot of fun, the questions are progressively challenging and despite the complaints about the ads I personally dont think it's as bad as they say, you can cut most of them in half by just looking at the top of the screen and looking for the X or the Arrows and click on them. Graphics are excellent and so for a good variety of categories.
data.replyText: Hello! We're glad to hear that you're having fun in our trivia game! Thanks for playing!

data.text: The questions on here are surprisingly challenging at times and I like the fact that it gets harder the further you get in a particular category. I like that the topics randomize and you can have options to choose from so it doesn't feel redundant. Aside from the occasional ad which isn't as frequent as other game apps, I find myself really enjoying Trivia Star.
data.replyText: Hello! We're glad to hear that you're having fun in our trivia game! Thanks for playing!

data.text: do not know how to send an in-app message. Least you can do is fix the glitches on the commercials so you don't have to close out and lose everything just to get back to playing the game. Sometimes the screen shows up black when you tap it it goes to a place to download another game. And you can't really close out what you have to do is restart your darn phone and that's just ridiculous. Be responsible and Fix it.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. Is there an improvement you‚Äôd like to see in a future update? Let our support team know any time by sending an in-app message.

data.text: This is a fun game and addictive! My 5 year old grandson loves playing, too. He can answer the animal guestions, Disney's guestions, and outdoor guestions. I love to be challenged, and some categories can be very challenging when I don't know anything about a certain sport or category. If the rating had gone higher, you would have gotten a higher rating, like a 10!
data.replyText: We are glad you‚Äôre enjoying our free trivia game! If there‚Äôs anything you‚Äôd like to see included in a future update, send our Support Team an in-app message any time.

data.text: Not a game just ads. Let me edit my review. After a a whopping 3 easy questions you get a "reward" they ask you if you want to watch an ad to double you try to press "no thanks" but it wont let you until like 10 seconds have passed. And when you do you still have to watch a fairly long ad. When youre allowed to skip the ad it still takes you to the app store. Not a game just ads. I understand ads make money. But this game is a money grab because the levels never get hard
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: Love this game! I down rated trivia star for one reason only. It's simply too expensive to play on a daily basis when you're someone on a fixed senior income budget. Those 99 cent purchases are adding up quickly and I simply can't afford to play this game as often as when I was at the beginning of the game. I suggest that you lower the amount of coins you lose which is 100 when yo miss a question and opt to try again. You are not listening to your customers. Uninstalling.
data.replyText: We are glad you‚Äôre enjoying our free trivia game! If there‚Äôs anything you‚Äôd like to see included in a future update, send our Support Team an in-app message any time.

data.text: No one wants to wait 3 hours for an extra life especially when the questions get harder at the higher levels. I don't like that you can't pick the expert you're getting help from when you click the Hint button. You should earn coins every time you complete a level. Especially since the experts cost so much to upgrade. There should be NO 2x multiplier or you shouldn't have to pay coins to start a level. I used to love this game but now its just frustrating to play.
data.replyText: Hello! We would like to improve your experience, if there‚Äôs anything the support team can do to assist, just send them a message through the game.

data.text: This is by far my favorite trivia game; however, it's frustrating that the game freezes and crashes constantly. Sometimes I play less than ten minutes before it happens and other times, it freezes at about 20-25ish minutes in. I step away for the rest of the day after it freezes. I'm torn about just deleting the app or hanging in there until it's fixed.
data.replyText: Hello! We would like to improve your experience, if there‚Äôs anything the support team can do to assist, just send them a message through the game.

data.text: This game isn't my favorite. The ads are pretty annoying. They are the 30-second sometimes playable ads, and you get one every three or four questions. You can get rid of ads by paying or watching videos. I've been playing a while, and so far the questions are mostly ridiculously easy. There's also a lot of fluff. Press for your reward. Press for the multiplier for your reward. Press to accept this multiplier. Can I just get to the next round? And they're always trying to sell you things.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: Game is fun. Waaaaaaaaay too many ads. I don't want an ad after round. The questions are basic and I keep getting the same questions over and over. If I could give zero stars I would Due to the excessive amount of ads. I understand ads bring in revenue but too many ads chase away revenue. It's not worth 4.99 not to have ads. Maybe a couple ads when you open the app and then let us enjoy the game. Not to mention the constant notifications popping up. This was like spam of the 90s keep popping up
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: What's the sense in collecting coins if you can't use them for anything?? Its frustrating to watch your 'bank' go up, knowing it's worth Nothing!! Also, for some reason the Free Gems feature does not work no matter how many Ads you view. Waste of time. Then, to get extra Life to continue when you fail in a category , you have to watch a gazillion repetitive ads to get enough extra coins to continue! Ugh! It's a shame, this would have been a great game if it didn't have these redundant features.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: It starts off pretty easy, and there are some fun categories. It progresses in difficulty slowly, so you won't get frustrated with crazy questions. I found a few questions that were not exactly accurate, but I was able to guess the correct answer. However, a lot of it is US culture based knowledge, so if you don't live in the US, you will struggle with certain categories.
data.replyText: Hello! We would like to improve your experience, if there‚Äôs anything the support team can do to assist, just send them a message through the game.

data.text: Great game if you want to just answer questions. Every game is worth 50 points and you complete the level, but nothing else ever happens. I recommend putting an area on game that someone could get in touch with you, Giving an increase in coins after a certain amount of levels, replays for only 50 points not 100, and being able to empty the pig without having to pay for it. ***I already explained the problems, but thanks for not helping at all.
data.replyText: Hello! We would like to improve your experience, if there‚Äôs anything the support team can do to assist, just send them a message through the game.

data.text: This game is on the easy side, especially if you're into TV shows, media, from the last 20-25 years. Many 'opportunities' to spend money, such as the piggy bank,(dontcha wanna know what's inside? Only $.99!) About the ads... yes, there's a bunch, (& you can skip them by going out of the game, then getting back in) but my concern was the 1 ad I did start to watch, offered the chance to remove "the girl's TOP or BOTTOM". I found this highly inappropriate for ANY game. UNINSTALLED
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: so far I am loving it. a bit too many ads at this point but if the game stays playable without other issues I would be willing to pay 2.99 for add free in the future. we shall see. I quit playing due to excessive adds back then. Recently purchased a new phn and decided to try again. It is as bad if not worse. After one hr of trying to play I am done. The sheer # of adds just ruin the game.
data.replyText: Thank you for checking out our trivia game! If you need any assistance our Support Team can be reached by sending an in-app message.

data.text: Advertises as though it's like Jeopardy, it's not. Questions aren't good, categories aren't good and constantly repeat themselves. Ads. Ads. Ads. What's the point of tons of annoying ads, when it doesn't seem to do anything to make a more enjoyable game, again, just to remind the developers that my critique isn't just the ads. The questions aren't good, i.e. poorly stated. There are few categories and they are not enjoyable and constantly repeat themselves.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: Its fun but I hate how I can't choose what category I play. It rolls and gives me a choice of three, if I don't like those three I have to spend to get three more choices and if I know I can't get any questions right on all three options I would have to spend again. And the adds are sometimes right after the question which gets annoying, especially when the add stops working and I have to exit out of the app and restart.
data.replyText: Hello! We would like to improve your experience, if there‚Äôs anything the support team can do to assist, just send them a message through the game.

data.text: Weird structure for a trivia game. Spending points to take small 3 question quizzes that take less that 10 seconds to complete with basic knowledge of the subject with ads after each 10 second 3 question quiz. Also weird how they structured catagory picking with one never seemingly to show up in 3 choices that has upgrade to the game once you beat a certain level but the category never popped up once.

It was fun at 1st....then the ads kicked in ; I'm not against them, but this was way too much too often, with those idiotic examples of pulling poles out of places in the game to dump either water or lava to melt the bad guy or save you, but EVERY SINGLE TIME the idiocy is maintained by the (obviously) wrong choice, followed by a large red FAIL sign. Duh. Now, they're making the X's to end the ad so damb small, you need a stylus. Uninstall was my obvious choice; too bad it ruined a nice game.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: I learn more of what I don't know, and am shocked when I win! I like that there is such a variety of categories. The competitions are inspired! Glad I keep playing! It does train your brain! It remains still very fun! The new categories are awesome! You guys should have a ratio of what a player's strengths and weaknesses are. Is there a feature to challenge answers, like in Scrabble? So fun!! Some of the newer categories are quite the challenge.
data.replyText: Hi! We‚Äôre glad you liked our trivia game. We appreciate the feedback!

data.text: Super easy questions. Forced to watch an ad (or two) before & after each question plus at the start of every game. Overall just a very lame game ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è I get it you need/want to make a lot of money, but think from the player's perspective... Perhaps have an ad at the start of the game and at the end of every 2-3 questions instead of one at the beginning & end of every single question.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: The only reason AND only reason I gave it 2 stars was because it was fun playing it for the whole 15-20 minutes I downloaded it for. I deleted it after that. Like everyone else has said, there are WAYYYY too many ads. It's RIDICULOUS how many ads there are. You play a game and watch an ad, play 2 games, watch an ad. Some ads are only 10 seconds long while others are 30-45 seconds long. No thank you!!
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: The questions are often ambiguous or just poorly worded. I came across several which had more than one true answer in the options. You have to answer a set of 10 questions correctly in order to win a round, and if you get even one incorrect you have to pay with gems to continue, or you can give up and pay another 100 gold coins to start another round. This combined with the fact that you pay coins to level your "Experts" means you can run out of coins VERY quickly, and then you have to pay $$.
data.replyText: Hello! We would like to improve your experience, if there‚Äôs anything the support team can do to assist, just send them a message through the game.

data.text: I downloaded because its offline and love trivia...But the ads are way too much for me. I understand that you may need SOME ads but its just crazy ridiculous After EVERY LEVEL..??ü§îüò¨ I just installed it played i think 4 or 5 games and then had enough. Although the game was really good! Thus the reason (ADS) that I gave the amount of üåü. Will change it later if it becomes of better fit.
data.replyText: It's understandable that ads can get annoying. Unfortunately, we need the revenue from ads to keep our games free to play. You can purchase to remove ads for just a couple of dollars. If you have any questions or comments, you can send us a message from the 'Contact Us' feature in your game menu.

data.text: I downloaded this game for my customers but the enormous amount of adds makes the experience more frustrating than exciting. I understand adds pays the bills. Isn't there a better way to include adds without interrupting the game? I've decided to uninstall. I found another trivia game with a ticker on the lower part of the screen and game play isn't interrupted.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. Is there an improvement you‚Äôd like to see in a future update? Let our support team know any time by sending an in-app message.

data.text: Pretty easy. The long ad breaks in between each round throw your brain off so you're not really concentrating enough. Whoever came up with the idea of stringing tons of ads in in between each round that last 15 or 30 seconds was insanely stupid. I'd like this game a lot more if the ads were much shorter. For this reason, I am deleting it it's not worth my time.
data.replyText: We are glad you‚Äôre enjoying our free trivia game! If there‚Äôs anything you‚Äôd like to see included in a future update, send our Support Team an in-app message any time.

data.text: Aside from ads and the occasional hiccup, everything has been great up until the last few weeks. At some point in the 1400 levels while playing the 48hr Star Tournaments, my position has been downgraded even with 1st, 2nd and 3rd place finishes. Additionally, no coin or gem rewards have been granted. Message the help and I get a one time small deposit but the problem persists and there is no further assistance that can be provided. After multiple messages, I now cannot even compete. Not worthit
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: Normally, I do not mind ads, however, there is an ad after every question. I spend more time watching the ads then I do playing the game. I understand that's what makes it "free for everyone" hense the makers comments on everyone's posts, but at somepoint you have to make the users happy too. Not everyone can afford 3 dollars a week or 10 dollars to remove ads. Other than that the game would be one if the best I've played.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: Good game, even paid the 4.99 to eliminate adds, however, there is a problematic glitch within the game. While competing in the 2 day tournament feature I've experienced Twice now the glitch whereas instead of being promoted to the next level I was demoted, even when placing in 1st place and 5th place, top 10 are promoted while 11 and lower are demoted.

data.text: Uninstalled. CONSTANT AD INTERRUPTIONS! CONSTANT. They make the game basically unplayable, impossible to enjoy at the very least. Very disappointed. I was looking forward to this game. Make the ads options for extra coins or try agains like some of the other successful quiz games and you will have a winner. Right now though. It's ridiculous.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: I love trivia and tend to be very competitive when playing most games. Playing this game is so addictive especially with being on a team where we can compete for prizes. There's so many categories too. I'm surprised that I can answer many questions in categories I would never have picked! This game keeps getting more challenging with every level I achieve, which makes it even more fun! Best game I've ever downloaded!!
data.replyText: Hi! We‚Äôre so glad you‚Äôre having fun with our trivia game. Happy gaming!

data.text: Game appears to be tailored to very young children. In an hour of play I didn't encounter a single difficult question, and only the sports questions would be out of place in an elementary school classroom. Maybe a good trivia game for young kids, but wasn't advertized that way. Reply: A difficulty setting would be great. Assume you have a difficulty score for questions and difficulty increases incrementally. Let me raise the starting level or increase rate of increase on difficulty.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your review. We‚Äôre sorry to hear you haven‚Äôt been enjoying the game, is there something in particular you‚Äôd like to see? Let the support team know by sending an in-app message.

data.text: Questions were too easy, I went to Level 14 before I came to the conclusion they wouldn't get any more interesting and uninstalled. Category choices were meh. And LOTS of ads. You also waste a LOT of time clicking - you have to click twice for every new Q, click out of the ads multiple times to get back to game, & there's only about 5 Qs per round so then you have to click to earn coins, click to start a new round, etc. Point being It's just annoying + a huge waste of time.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with our game. As a small company, ads are what make sure we can keep the game free for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can assist with, please send them an in-app message.

data.text: I love trivia games and this one is no exception, I gave it such a low rating because of the frequency it forces you to watch an advertisement, it will force an ad on you every 1-3 games played, the average game length lasts about 7 seconds, you'll spend more time waiting to stop the ad then playing. There is also an option to stop ads completely with a $2.99 fee, it seems they don't care about customer experience, Dont bother downloading unless you want to spend your time watching ads.

data.text: Just another dump and sort game that's nothing like the ad promoting it. There are no different scenarios as shown in the Play Store, only the same dump and sort round after round. By the 5th round, having run out of time, I was already prompted to either watch a 30 sec ad or pay 1000 coins (being new to the game, I had only acquired 500). I'm not against paying to play good games from time to time, but seeing as how they misrepresented this one, I'm uninstalling it instead.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback about the game! Ads are what make sure we can keep the game available for everyone. If there is anything the Support team can do to help, please send them an in app message.

data.text: Ots a good game except for one problem. It freezes after 9 levels. Lets me get to the last question before its suppose to gove me a bonus chest and freezes. Refuses to load. I have to exit the game and then reopen it but it starts me back at 1. I have missed a dozen or more chests like this just because of this glitch. Otherwise Id give it a good score.

data.text: Gameplay is great, but there's an ad between EVERY round. I understand you need to make money, but that's just way too much. Becomes quite annoying because the ads are longer than 1 short round of questions. You'll get tired of sitting through them constantly. Also not quite as described. The ad i clicked on to download this made it look like the tv game show "Who Wants to be a Millionaire". This is regular trivial pursuit.

data.text: Not impressed with this game. It's buggy, crashes on my tablet about every other round (which costs you 100 coins every time it restarts), and shows the same abortion ad after every single round. The questions in the first level are way too easy, and I couldn't stand to play the second level because I was already tired of the game.

data.text: Software is extremely buggy & makes it frustrating to play. Tournaments are supposed to reward you when you place high. However, you wont get your rewards due to the tech guys not having a clue how to fix the issue. You send a message to tech support & are informed they are still working on it & that i will no longer be gifted. Also, you are supposed to move up a level in a tournament and instead, you are randomly placed contrary to their own rules. Tech guys running this game are clueless.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear you're running into issues with Tournaments. Please send our Support team an in app message at any time for further investigation or updates. Thank you for playing our game!

data.text: I don't mind ads in a free to play game, but when there's a 30 second ad every minute or two that's when it becomes unplayable, and the ad's are very unappealing low budget ad's. The game itself is fine though. I dont know how hard it gets in the advanced stages, but in the beginning the questions are very very easy.

data.text: Odd reward system. Seems the only way to collect diamonds (needed to pay for a wrong answer) is to pay with real $$ - or watch several minutes of ads that's only enough to pay for only one mistake. Getting correct answers, quickly, gets you nothing but coins or stars - but no way to use them for mistakes. Collecting them are easy - but useless to keep you in the game. Lifelines are limited too. I'll be deleting; too bad - it's fun.

data.text: Best trivia game I've found. Very enjoyable to play which I do a lot. I learn a lot too!! I've been playing it over a year now and I haven't had the same question twice. Lots of catagories. It never gets old! Another thing that's great are the ad's are super short. Been playing for months, never boring. I enjoy getting the free coins! It keeps getting better and better! It's the best!!
